pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Extreme Value Analysis with the Hierarchical Model of Reich and Shaby (2012) // Simulation and fitting procedures for a particular hierarchical max-stable model: the HKEVP of Reich and Shaby (2012) DOI:10.1214/12-AOAS591. Spatial prediction and marginal distribution extrapolation are also available, which allows a risk estimation at an ungauged site.
